venueName: Crab Du Jour Charleston Cajun Seafood Restaurant & Bar

pages.text: Skip to content Call Us! 843-553-3760 Our Location 2150 Northwoods Blvd North Charleston SC 29406 Home Come Check Us Out Call Now! Dine In | Take Outs Order Online Welcome to Crab Du Jour! Call Now! Dine In | Take Outs Order Online View Menu Our Story Crab Du Jour offers experience-driven seafood dining in a fun, communal atmosphere, perfect for friends and family. Our Cajun-inspired eatery is known for fresh seafood boils (made for sharing) and an array of signature house-blended sauces, to enhance the experience. We offer everything from delicious starters like wings, po-boys, chicken tenders, and seafood favorites such as fried fish, shrimp, crab and oysters.
